programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
programme.desc: Al and Dwight go rogue on a recon mission for Ginny to follow a lead thought lost, but Al must choose between what she has now and what she's chasing.

programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
programme.desc: John is settling in as one of Virginia's rangers when a mysterious death sends him on an investigation that makes him question everything he thought about himself.

programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
programme.desc: Dwight and Sherry team up with a mysterious faction of people to take down Ginny; when Morgan unexpectedly offers to help, a power struggle ensues.

programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
programme.sub-title: Bury Her Next to Jasper's Leg
programme.desc: A deadly explosion in the oil fields sends June on a mission to save as many lives as possible; an investigation by Virginia threatens to undermine June's work.

programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
programme.desc: When Dakota goes missing, Strand sends Alicia and Charlie on a search and rescue mission to find her; an unlikely ally provides a new possibility of escape from Virginia.

programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
programme.desc: A reunion with an old friend helps pull John Dorie out of his darkest moment yet; back at Lawton, Virginia demands answers.

programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
programme.desc: A stand-off occurs between Virginia, her rangers and Morgan's group; Ginny has made a lot of enemies and it's finally catching up to her.

programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
programme.desc: A threat worse than Virginia is on the horizon; Morgan calls for unity and invites all survivors to his settlement, tasking Daniel to keep the peace; however, Daniel will need to face his own challenge in hopes of protecting his friends.

programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
programme.desc: An infiltration turns rescue mission as members of the group dig deeper into an underground community.

programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
programme.desc: Grace wakes up with a case of amnesia and sees what has become of her friends after she has been gone for years; she struggles to put the puzzle pieces together on what has transpired.

programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
programme.desc: June splits off from the group in an effort to gather any information to help stop an oncoming threat.

programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
programme.desc: Alicia is held prisoner by Teddy; there, she reunites with old friends and must confront her past if she hopes to move on and escape.

programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
programme.desc: In a race against time to stop Teddy's plan, motives are revealed and convictions are tested as Morgan and his allies infiltrate and make their way through the beached submarine that holds the tools for Teddy's destruction.

programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
programme.desc: Everyone desperately scrambles to live out the coming destruction on their own terms.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The Whisperers are coming for Hilltop; after Daryl and Lydia's encounter with Alpha, the communities must decide whether to run or fight; Eugene's communication with Stephanie gets complicated.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Michonne takes Virgil back to his mysterious island to reunite with his family; in exchange, Virgil promises weapons that could change the tide of the Whisperer War.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: With Negan's help, Alpha and the Whisperers attack Hilltop.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Heroes and villains reckon with the aftermath of the Hilltop fire; Eugene takes a group on a journey to meet Stephanie, with the hopes of befriending another civilization.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The communities prepare for the final battle of the Whisperer War; meanwhile, Eugene's group encounters Princess.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Beta engages the final battle of the Whisperer War.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Maggie returns, to the dismay of Negan; the trials she endured since leaving have made her harder in order for her and her son to survive; Daryl and Maggie unexpectedly fight an unseen and unknown threat.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl and Carol find an old cabin that takes Daryl back to his years away from the group after Rick disappeared; he relives the painful memory of meeting a reticent survivor and the toxic events that amplified his relationship with Dog.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: With Maggie's map, Gabriel and Aaron search for food and supplies to bring back to Alexandria; checking out one more location, they chance upon a stash; faith is broken and optimism is fragmented when they are put to the ultimate test.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Eugene, Ezekiel, Yumiko, and Princess are captured and separated by the mysterious troopers that surrounded them at the rail yard; claustrophobic with mounting anxiety, Princess struggles with memories of her traumatic past and plans to escape.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: At the lowest point in their friendship, Daryl and Carol come to a fork in the road and head their separate ways; Carol returns to Alexandria, while Daryl stays on the road, each going into their own type of survival mode.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: With Maggie back at Alexandria, Carol takes Negan on a journey to minimize the increasing tension; here, Negan reflects on his late wife, Lucille, and the events that led him to this point.

programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
programme.desc: While most of the landscape is destroyed by nuclear warheads, Strand thrives in one of the few inhabitable places left; Strand's search for survivors uncovers a stranger with an unexpected connection to his past.

programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
programme.desc: As Morgan, Grace and Mo struggle to adapt to life on the submarine, a food shortage forces them to face the nuclear fallout outside the sub.
